review: I have enjoyed this device. I mainly use it as a backup to my Xbox One for streaming services such as Netflix and Amazon Prime. It is small, fast, easy to use, and my only complaint is the power cord that comes with it. I am using a powered USB port built in to my TV and it works fine even though the Fire TV Stick warns me about using it isn't recommended. I read online that the reason for this is because the powered USB port will turn off with the TV and Fire TV Stick wants power all the time so that it can perform updates. However, the USB cable provided is much to short for anyone that might have cables run through their wall due to their TV being mounted. For example, my TV is mounted on an extension mount so that it can be pulled away from the wall. I'd have to run the USB cable from the TV along the extensions arms, down the inside of my wall, then down to a power outlet. The provided cable is not even close to long enough and it wasn't worth it to me to buy a long enough USB cable when the powered USB port works just fine.Overall, I am pleasantly surprised with how well it works. I didn't have high expectations since it is wireless only, but picture quality has been excellent. I can't use my Harmony remote since the device obviously isn't IR, but the provided remote and the smart phone apps are more than adequate. All in all, a magnificent device, especially when looking at its price.
